statements.query: MATCH (n:DynamoDBTable)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)

MATCH (g:DynamoDBGlobalSecondaryIndex)<-[:GLOBAL_SECONDARY_INDEX]-(:DynamoDBTable)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE g.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH g LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (g)
MATCH (:DynamoDBGlobalSecondaryIndex)<-[r:GLOBAL_SECONDARY_INDEX]-(:DynamoDBTable)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
